item.title: EF Core 7 is here - Welcome typed entity id üçæ
item.description: Source code EF 7 has been released at dotnetconf and it brings a heap of new and exciting features. To read about all the new goodnes in this release you can go through the What’s new in EF Core 7 docs page. One of the feature I’m more excited about that hasn’t been properly advertised (hence this post), in my opinion, is support for what they call Value generation for DDD guarded types.
